articles.title: Facebook acquires GIF website Giphy to integrate with Instagram - DealStreetAsia
articles.description: The cost, which Facebook and Giphy declined to disclose, was placed at around $400 million by news website Axios.
articles.content:
Facebook Inc is acquiring Giphy, a popular website for making and sharing animated images, or GIFs, and will integrate it with its rapidly growing Instagram photo-sharing app, Facebook said in a blog post on Friday.
